msContents.summary: Ff. i v - ii v: Excerpt from Horologium for the Day and Night Hours of Abba Giyorgis, Sä‘ätat, ሰዓታት: ዘአቡነ: ጊዮርጊስ: ዘሌሊት: ወዘመዓልት፡. F-37v: Sword of Divinity, Säyfä Mäläkot, ሠይፈ፡ መለኮት፡, arranged for the days of the week by a later hand: Monday (), Tuesday (), Wednesday (), Thursday (), Friday (), Saturday (), Sunday (). AbbCat 171, , Notice 104; AbbCat 186, , Notice 233; StrLin 47, f.88v; EMML 1169, . F-66r: Canticle of the flower, Maḫletä Ṣǝge, ማሕሌተ፡ ጽጌ፡. Grohmann, Marienhymnen, 46–321; Osvaldo Raineri, Codices Comboniani Aethiopici (Vatican City, 2000) 108f., no. 103; Täsfa Gäbrä Śǝlasse, ማሕሌተ፡ ጽጌ፡ ወሰቆቃወ፡ ድንግል። (Addis Ababa, 1964 A. M. = 1971/2). See also Fessehation Andemariam, “Mariology in the ‘Mahleta Sege’: Abba Giyorgis Gassičča’s ‘Hymn of the Flower,’” MA Thesis, Salesian Pontifical University (Rome, 1994), beginning with Image of Mary, ሰላም ለዝክረ ስምኪ ሐመልማል ጽጌ ገነት. Répertoire 171. F-68v: Image of Rufa’el, Mälk‘a Rufa’el, መልክአ፡ ሩፋኤል፡. Répertoire 215. EMML, 1217 (IV:198). : Greeting to the congregation of diligent angels, ሰላም: ለክሙ: ማኅበረ: መላእክት: ትጉሃን:. Not listed in Répertoire. F-78v: Image of the Trinity, Mälk‘a Śǝllase, መልክአ፡ ሥላሴ፡. Répertoire 20; MG 189ff. F-80v: Prayer to the Trinity, “Blessing and Praise,” ባርኮ፡ ወውዳሴ። F-88r: Image of the Savior of the World, Mälk‘a Mädḫane Aläm, መልክአ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡. Répertoire 164. F-93r: Asmat prayer for protection which the Lord Prayed, beginning, ጸሎት ዘጸለየ እግዚአ ዘቀተልከ አንበሳ, written in a later hand. F and passim mention the owner, ወልድ ሐና, who is called, ገብረ እግዚአብሔር. A secondary owner is listed on , ወልዳ ሰማዕት.
